data.prayer: Lord, you already know the names of the prophets you want to raise up in Gros Islet. Please, raise them up and give them the courage to speak your truth to your church.
data.verse: Before I formed you in the womb I knew you, and before you were born I consecrated you; I appointed you a prophet to the nations.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Gros Islet, Saint Lucia
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Spirit, guide someone in the church in the state of Gros Islet to a person ready to receive the message of the gospel, like Lydia, and who will then open her home to faith.
data.verse: One of those listening was a woman from the city of Thyatira named Lydia, a dealer in purple cloth. She was a worshiper of God. The Lord opened her heart to respond to Paul’s message.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 5 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, your Word can be a lamp to the feet of the 19,392 people in the state of Gros Islet who claim to know you, if they open it and read it today.
data.verse: your Word is a lamp to my feet and a light to my path.

data.prayer: Father, send out evangelists who will challenge people like Peter who said, "Repent and be baptized, every one of you" in the state of Gros Islet, Saint Lucia.
data.verse: Peter replied, “Repent and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins. And you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Cap Estate
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Cap Estate, Gros Islet, Saint Lucia.
Jesus, please help the 4,618 believers in the state of Gros Islet to be filled with joyful obedience at all times, as you modeled for us all.
Father, may the churches in Gros Islet, Saint Lucia honor local leaders who work hard for the flock of God.
data.verse: Pay careful attention to yourselves and to all the flock, in which the Holy Spirit has made you overseers, to care for the church of God, which he obtained with his own blood.

data.section_summary:
the state of Gros Islet, Saint Lucia has a population of 25,300.

We estimate Gros Islet has 4,618 people who might know Jesus, 19,392 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,289 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 5 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, let the threatened of Gros Islet, Saint Lucia know that it is better to trust in you than to trust in humans.
data.verse: It is better to take refuge in the Lord than to trust in humans.
